comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I'll bring the leeches. See ya' soon.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: We (the family and I) are tentatively good-to-go for the I-Peaks trip... right up until the overnight part. That's where we'll probably peel off and head into Ned for a hot meal at the Kathmandu. We'll think of you as we dig into the naan and inhale the bottomless chai. Are skis allowed?

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: Skis allowed in the bottomless chai? Well, I can think of a couple of reasons why it'd be bad to soak skis in such a liquid; though I don't know if they've explicitly outlawed the practice.
